Abstract: Sensory analysis plays a pivotal role in understanding consumer preferences and guiding product development. This study explores best practices in sensory analysis, focusing on consumer tests and descriptive analysis methodologies. By examining the effectiveness of various sensory evaluation techniques, the research aims to identify strategies that enhance the accuracy and reliability of consumer preference data. The findings underscore the importance of standardized testing environments, trained panels, and the integration of consumer feedback in the sensory analysis process. This paper contributes to the field by offering actionable insights for optimizing sensory evaluation practices to better meet consumer expectations and market demands.
